column4: USB_EPFIFO [0..5] USB FIFO Entry for Endpoint N
USB_POWER, USB_DEVCTL, USB_EPINDEX, USB_DMACTL USB Global Control and Status Register
USB_INTTX USB_EPINTF USB Endpoint Interrupt Flag Register
USB_INTTXE USB_EPINTE USB Endpoint Interrupt Enable Register
USB_INTUSB USB_BUSINTF USB Bus Interrupt Flag Register
USB_INTUSBE USB_BUSINTE USB Bus Interrupt Enable Register
USB_TXMAXP USB EP1~5 Tx Control and Status Register
USB_RXMAXP USB EP1~5 Rx Control and Status Register
USB_EPATTR USB EP0 Attribute Register, USB EP1~5 Attribute Register
USB_TXFIFO (bits 28:16 Start address of the endpoint FIFO is in units of 8 bytes)
USB_RXFIFO (bits 28:16 Start address of the endpoint FIFO is in units of 8 bytes)
Control PHY routing to EHCI or OTG
HCI SIE Port Disable Control Register
USB DMA Byte Counter Register/USB DMA RESIDUAL Byte Counter Register
